Author: Regnar#6164
Content: I know it's not market related, but does anyone like the idea of a trollbox like chat?

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: I was thinking it could provide some type of positive benefit especially for atomic swap powered exchanges. I'm thinking that if you were to open HyperDEX to make a trade and see little volume you might just leave, but trades can happen any time but only when the DEX is open. So it might give people a reason to stay on and chat, find traders, or do something while they wait for confirmations. Obviously this could be done in here or telegram or something, but anyway.

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: just came to mind as I was waiting for the 5 confirmations for a swap and didn't have discord open to chat with people haha. Just a thought

Author: yorklab#7270
Content: A chat might be a way for people to set up direct trades also.

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: yea very true. just come for the hanging out, find someone wanting to trade haha

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: I think for true DEXs that will always be a problem. CEX can only have volume of the people in their wallets, but are very active because they are there to trade. We can have true population sized volume, but only if people are on at the right times and active.

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: It could probably go right where the swap box is on exchange tab.

Content: Yea, the dex needing to be open to make trades can make liquidity spotty, but if we have some other reasons to be on the dex too, it can help keep orderbooks open providing liquidity. Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: @Regnar For the Trollbox, @Alright worked out a way of making a TROLL blockchain that uses KV storage to facilitate chat. It would be a cool gimick, however every user would need to run a full node of TROLL for it to work.

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: yea I was thinking a little bit easier of a way, host a chat on the HyperDEX website (maybe hidden) use API so each HyperDEX app accesses it and can send through it.

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: given, the chat would be "centralized" but who cares lol

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: You can make a centralised chat no problem, but that kind of ruins the philosophy behind the DEX>

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Maybe just use a Matrix Server?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: thats "decentralised"
